Headline: Serena supports Osaka after French Open withdrawal
Text: In an earlier statement, Osaka said she did not want her stance to become a distraction and said that she had been dealing with mental health issues since 2018.Williams, 39, was inevitably asked for her reaction to Osaka's decision following her first-round win over Romanian Irina-Camelia Begu."The only thing I feel is that I feel for Naomi. I feel like I wish I could give her a hug because I know what it's like. Like I said, I've been in those positions."We have different personalities, and people are different. Not everyone is the same. I'm thick (skinned). Other people are thin.
